name: Brain Damaged
description: Use your head to help Boblin the Goblin rebuild his village before Roblin the red Goblin and his crew attack you ! Beware of them... They're goblins after all... Gather ressources, build tall, hit hard ! Description: Brain Damaged is an Isometric top down view . You will play as an goblin who must colect ressources and rebuild houses for is all village Features: Credits:
